| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [EvilHack - monst.c, line 1176](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/blob/master/src/monst.c#L1176) |

A **cauchemar**, u, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). Cauchemars are [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivorous "Herbivorous") and [domestic](/wiki/Domestic "Domestic") [horse-like](/wiki/Unicorn_or_horse "Unicorn or horse") monsters that serve as the [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") equivalent of the [warhorse](/wiki/Warhorse "Warhorse") and possess most of the same qualities.

A cauchemar has a kick attack and a [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") bite attack, and possesses [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").

Eating a cauchemar [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") conveys 20% (1⁄5) [additional poison resistance](/wiki/Partial_intrinsic "Partial intrinsic").

## Generation

Cauchemars may be generated as peaceful for chaotic characters. A [(greater) nightmare](/wiki/Nightmare_\(EvilHack\) "Nightmare (EvilHack)") can [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up") into a cauchemar.

Cauchemars appear among the random u that are part of the second quest [monster class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class") for [Infidels](/wiki/Infidel "Infidel") and make up 24⁄175 of the monsters randomly generated on the [Infidel quest](/wiki/Infidel_quest "Infidel quest").

## Encyclopedia entry

By a route obscure and lonely,  
Haunted by ill angels only,  
Where an Eidolon, named NIGHT,  
On a black throne reigns upright,  
I have reached these lands but newly  
From an ultimate dim Thule--  
From a wild weird clime that lieth, sublime,  
Out of SPACE -- Out of TIME.  
\[ Dream-Land, by Edgar Allen Poe ]

html:
Cauchemar

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
u cauchemar (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks Kick 1d10, Bite 1d4 poison
u cauchemar (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Kick 1d10, Bite 1d4 poison

Base level 7
Base experience 69
Speed 24
Base AC 4
Base MR 0
Alignment -9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1800
Nutritional value 350
Size Large
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed poison (+20%)

A cauchemar:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is herbivorous.
  • can be tamed by feeding.
  • wanders randomly.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference EvilHack - monst.c, line 1176

A cauchemar, u, is a type of monster that appears in EvilHack and Hack'EM. Cauchemars are herbivorous and domestic horse-like monsters that serve as the chaotic equivalent of the warhorse and possess most of the same qualities.

A cauchemar has a kick attack and a poisonous bite attack, and possesses poison resistance.

Eating a cauchemar corpse or tin conveys 20% (1⁄5) additional poison resistance.

Generation

Cauchemars may be generated as peaceful for chaotic characters. A (greater) nightmare can grow up into a cauchemar.

Cauchemars appear among the random u that are part of the second quest monster class for Infidels and make up 24⁄175 of the monsters randomly generated on the Infidel quest.

Encyclopedia entry

By a route obscure and lonely,
Haunted by ill angels only,
Where an Eidolon, named NIGHT,
On a black throne reigns upright,
I have reached these lands but newly
From an ultimate dim Thule--
From a wild weird clime that lieth, sublime,
Out of SPACE -- Out of TIME.
[ Dream-Land, by Edgar Allen Poe ]

A '''cauchemar''', {{green|u}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]] and [[Hack'EM]]. Cauchemars are [[herbivorous]] and [[domestic]] [[Unicorn or horse|horse-like]] monsters that serve as the [[chaotic]] equivalent of the [[warhorse]] and possess most of the same qualities.

A cauchemar has a kick attack and a [[poisonous]] bite attack, and possesses [[poison resistance]].

Eating a cauchemar [[corpse]] or [[tin]] conveys 20% ({{frac|5}}) [[Partial intrinsic|additional poison resistance]].

==Generation==
Cauchemars may be generated as peaceful for chaotic characters. A [[Nightmare (EvilHack)|(greater) nightmare]] can [[grow up]] into a cauchemar.

Cauchemars appear among the random {{white|u}} that are part of the second quest [[monster class]] for [[Infidel]]s and make up {{frac|24|175}} of the monsters randomly generated on the [[Infidel quest]].

	From a wild weird clime that lieth, sublime,
